name: text_overlays
rule: When producing videos, non-diegetic on-screen text must NOT be baked into generator renders. Add text using Shotstack overlay layers in post.
examples: GOOD: Generator renders clean scene; editor adds captions via overlays.
BAD: Prompt includes 'text on screen', resulting in baked-in artifacts.
guidelines: Use overlays for captions, labels, and calls-to-action.
Only bake text if it is physically part of the scene (diegetic signage).
